KVM VPS Hosting
Unmanaged KVM VPS Hosting - Powered by KVM
----------------------------------------------------
Our KVM Virtual Private Servers(VPS) in Netherlands are located in one of the Best European Datacenters and our servers are connected with major network traffic exchange nodes in Europe with outlet to USA, Germany etc..

Now with multiple exchanges enabled, your website or projects can be accessed at high speed around the world. Netherlands KVM VPS Hosting IP`s are DDOS Protected by default, with 1Gbps Volume network and 500k PPS.

- 99% Uptime Guarantee.

- Instant Scalability.
- Weekly backups*.
- Enterprise Hardware Resource.
- Location Netherlands.
- Software Licenses.
- FREE DDOS Protection.
- FREE 1 IPv4 and 5 IPv6 Address
